title: Say Yes
description: Friends make the best lovers. Or so Casey Santiago thinks.  For ten years, she’s lived with the memories of an abusive childhood. Now, she’s ready to make new ones. Who better to help her than her best friend, Philip Maxwell?  When she approaches him with her shocking proposal, he hesitates. Sex complicates things.  Can Casey convince Philip that their friendship is strong enough to withstand anything, including falling in love?
author: L.K. Shaw
